channel.title: My First Sig
channel.description:
Rate and C&C please. I know it sucks but it's my first. :S Tell me how to improve as well. =D
[IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg129/Omega1210/Megaman3V2.png[/img]

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

K, i’ll do a new one tomorrow

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

still looks pixilated. Id just scrap that one and start on a new one

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

This is the outcome of brushing

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

r[quote=“javis, post:6, topic:190006”]Take out your blur tool and addjest the oppacity to like 25-40, then pick out a nice brush and go over the hands until its looks a little less pixilated. When on planetrenders try to pic out a better render from there selection athough the way that looks i think you might have done something to it to make it look that way.

Its a good first. the bg effects is pretty sweet.[/quote]
Yeah I was screwing around with it and the pixelation kinda screwed up. What kind of brush do I use… I only have the default ones with dots… of different sizes lol.
Thanks.

nator123123:

o looks like you didn’t use a c4d

Lol. It would take me forever to find one.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

o looks like you didn’t use a c4d

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @javis javis
item.description:
@javis wrote:

Take out your blur tool and addjest the oppacity to like 25-40, then pick out a nice brush and go over the hands until its looks a little less pixilated. When on planetrenders try to pic out a better render from there selection athough the way that looks i think you might have done something to it to make it look that way.

Its a good first. the bg effects is pretty sweet.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Sig
item.dc:creator: @OmidSan OmidSan
item.description:
@OmidSan wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:190006”][quote author=OmidSan link=topic=253024.msg2114252#msg2114252 date=1205711121]

Very sketchy and pixely.

If its your first then its kinda alright, You should try to find better renders and techniques for the backgrounds.

Better renders…? Like what. I get mines from planetrenders, you mean like different people?
And I do think that the background is a little screwy. Lol
[/quote]
Like the guy’s hands and stuff are all pixeled[/quote]
Oh…But idk how to take that away.

Read full topic
